detailed_info.name: Decyl glucoside
detailed_info.description: Decyl glucoside is a nonionic surfactant widely used in natural products. It is used most of the time as a co-surfactant with Coco Betaine (amphoteric surfactant) and Coco Glucoside (nonionic surfactant). Not very aggressive, it is made from sugar and coconut. It is suitable for the most sensitive skin like baby's. It is authorized in organic.

functions.name: Cleansing
functions.description: Helps to keep a clean surface

functions.name: Emulsion stabilising
functions.description: Promotes the emulsification process and improves the stability and shelf life of the emulsion

functions.name: Surfactant
functions.description: Reduces the surface tension of cosmetics and contributes to the even distribution of the product when it is used
